segments.text: I notice the kitchen scene, and it tugs at my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, unaware of the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is creating such a sorrowful mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spilling out, soaking everything, it's just depressing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing there, one foot wet, oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is tilting, and he could fall any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, but this feels like trouble brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking treats, but at what cost if something goes wrong?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside contrasts with this indoor sadness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the potential heartbreak of an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't moments like this stay innocent and safe?
segments.speaker: PAR
